meanings.sent1: That doy always makes silly decisions.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a doy and listen to bad advice.
meanings.sent3: The doy thought it was a good idea to wear socks with sandals.
meanings.sent4: He's such a doy, always getting into trouble.
meanings.sent5: The doy's actions were so foolish, everyone laughed.

meanings.definition: To act in a foolish or stupid manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't doy around and break things.
meanings.sent2: She tends to doy when she's nervous.
meanings.sent3: He decided to doy by trying to juggle eggs.
meanings.sent4: Stop doying and start thinking before you act.
meanings.sent5: The children doyed around, pretending to be superheroes.
